org.shared.net.handler

Interface FilteredHandler<H extends FilteredHandler<H,C,T>,C extends Connection,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    H - the parameterization lower bounded by FilteredHandler itself.
    C - the Connection type.
    T - the Filter inbound type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    ConnectionHandler<C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFilteredHandler, ClientServerTest.Utf8Handler, SynchronousHandler, TestXmlHandler, XmlHandler

    public interface FilteredHandler<H extends FilteredHandler<H,C,T>,C extends Connection,T>
extends ConnectionHandler<C>
    Defines a ConnectionHandler that uses Filters to process inbound and outbound data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.shared.net.ConnectionHandler
